page.title: 13Tourist Places near Bexhill
page.content: {Clergy House,}Alfriston {Drusilla's Zoo,}Alfriston {Firle House}Stately Home near Lewes {Romney, Hythe & Dymchurch railway {Bodiam Castle {Pevensey Castle {Hastings Castle {Old Town, Rye}17th century timbered houses, cobbled streets,craft works {Michelham Priory {Brighton}- Engineerium, Pavilion, Aquarium, Dolphinarium, Marina {Bentley Wildfowl & Motor Museum {Butterfly Centre,}Eastbourne {Arlington Speedway track,}Eastbourne {Battle & Battle Abbey.}Site of the Battle of Hastings, 1066. {Glyndebourne Opera}near Lewes A great advantage of Bexhill to the tourist is that it is central to many places of interest easily accessible by public or private transport
